Player History
Released by Chicago (N) on 11/4/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1973...

Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 4/22/1976...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/28/1977...

Had 25-game hitting streak snapped on 5/21/1983...

Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1984, hitting .471 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1984...
